sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PSNL0126 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HODY_APPTN_YR , HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC , HODY_APPTN_NUM_DYS , HODY_USE_NUM_DYS , HODY_RST_NUM_DYS , HODY_BGNN_DT , HODY_END_DT , HODY_NOTE_CTNT , HODY_FIX_YN , LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_YN , LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , SPCL_HODY_NUM_DYS , SPCL_HODY_USE_DYS ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #hodyApptnYr# , #hodyNumDysSysCalc# , #hodyApptnNumDys# , #hodyUseNumDys# , #hodyRstNumDys# , #hodyBgnnDt# , #hodyEndDt# , #hodyNoteCtnt# , #hodyFixYn# , #lvsgCoptnCstApptnYn# , #lvsgCoptnCstApptnDt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# , #spclHodyNumDys# , #spclHodyUseDys#)
sqlMap.update: MERGE INTO PSNL0126 USING DUAL ON (DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET HODY_APPTN_YR=#hodyApptnYr# , HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC=#hodyNumDysSysCalc# , HODY_APPTN_NUM_DYS=#hodyApptnNumDys# , HODY_USE_NUM_DYS=#hodyUseNumDys# , HODY_RST_NUM_DYS=#hodyRstNumDys# , HODY_BGNN_DT=#hodyBgnnDt# , HODY_END_DT=#hodyEndDt# , HODY_NOTE_CTNT=#hodyNoteCtnt# , HODY_FIX_YN=#hodyFixYn# , LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_YN=#lvsgCoptnCstApptnYn# , LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_DT=#lvsgCoptnCstApptnDt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , SPCL_HODY_USE_DYS=#spclHodyUseDys# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND HODY_APPTN_YR=#hodyApptnYr# WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HODY_APPTN_YR , HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC , HODY_APPTN_NUM_DYS , HODY_USE_NUM_DYS , HODY_RST_NUM_DYS , HODY_BGNN_DT , HODY_END_DT , HODY_NOTE_CTNT , HODY_FIX_YN , LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_YN , LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , SPCL_HODY_USE_DYS ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #hodyApptnYr# , #hodyNumDysSysCalc# , #hodyApptnNumDys# , #hodyUseNumDys# , #hodyRstNumDys# , #hodyBgnnDt# , #hodyEndDt# , #hodyNoteCtnt# , #hodyFixYn# , #lvsgCoptnCstApptnYn# , #lvsgCoptnCstApptnDt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# , #spclHodyUseDys#)

UPDATE PSNL0126 SET ISMT=#ismt#
, HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC=#hodyNumDysSysCalc# , HODY_APPTN_NUM_DYS=#hodyApptnNumDys# , HODY_USE_NUM_DYS=#hodyUseNumDys# , HODY_RST_NUM_DYS=#hodyRstNumDys# , HODY_BGNN_DT=#hodyBgnnDt# , HODY_END_DT=#hodyEndDt# , HODY_NOTE_CTNT=#hodyNoteCtnt# , HODY_FIX_YN=#hodyFixYn# , HODY_FIX_DT = #hodyFixDt# , LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_YN=#lvsgCoptnCstApptnYn# , LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_DT=#lvsgCoptnCstApptnDt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , SPCL_HODY_NUM_DYS = #spclHodyNumDys# , SPCL_HODY_USE_DYS = #spclHodyUseDys# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND HODY_APPTN_YR=#hodyApptnYr#
AND HODY_FIX_YN = 'N'

UPDATE PSNL0126 SET
HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC=#hodyNumDysSysCalc# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND HODY_APPTN_YR=#hodyApptnYr#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PSNL0126 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND HODY_APPTN_YR=#hodyApptnYr# AND HODY_FIX_YN = 'N'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PSNL0126 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HODY_APPTN_YR , HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC , HODY_APPTN_NUM_DYS , HODY_USE_NUM_DYS , HODY_RST_NUM_DYS , HODY_BGNN_DT , HODY_END_DT , HODY_NOTE_CTNT , HODY_FIX_YN , LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_YN , LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , SPCL_HODY_NUM_DYS , SPCL_HODY_USE_DYS ) VALUES (#dpobCd# ,(SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE RESN_REGN_NUM = REPLACE(#resnRegnNum#,'-','')) , #hodyApptnYr# , #hodyNumDysSysCalc# , #hodyApptnNumDys# , #hodyUseNumDys# , (( #hodyApptnNumDys# + #spclHodyNumDys#) - ( #hodyUseNumDys# + #spclHodyUseDys#)) , #hodyBgnnDt# , #hodyEndDt# , #hodyNoteCtnt# , #hodyFixYn# , #lvsgCoptnCstApptnYn# , #lvsgCoptnCstApptnDt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# , #spclHodyNumDys# , #spclHodyUseDys#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PSNL0126 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=(SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE RESN_REGN_NUM = REPLACE(#resnRegnNum#,'-','')) AND HODY_APPTN_YR=#hodyApptnYr#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PSNL0126 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HODY_APPTN_YR , HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC , HODY_APPTN_NUM_DYS , HODY_USE_NUM_DYS , HODY_RST_NUM_DYS , HODY_BGNN_DT , HODY_END_DT , HODY_NOTE_CTNT , HODY_FIX_YN , LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_YN , LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# ,(SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND RESN_REGN_NUM = REPLACE(#resnRegnNum#,'-','')) , #hodyApptnYr# , #hodyNumDysSysCalc# , #hodyApptnNumDys# , #hodyUseNumDys# , #hodyRstNumDys# , #hodyBgnnDt# , #hodyEndDt# , #hodyNoteCtnt# , #hodyFixYn# , #lvsgCoptnCstApptnYn# , #lvsgCoptnCstApptnDt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PSNL0126 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=(SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND RESN_REGN_NUM = REPLACE(#resnRegnNum#,'-','') ) AND HODY_APPTN_YR=#hodyApptnYr#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PSNL0126 A, PSNL0100 B SET A.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# , A.HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC=#hodyNumDysSysCalc# , A.HODY_APPTN_NUM_DYS=#hodyApptnNumDys# , A.HODY_USE_NUM_DYS=#hodyUseNumDys# , A.HODY_RST_NUM_DYS=#hodyRstNumDys# , A.HODY_BGNN_DT=#hodyBgnnDt# , A.HODY_END_DT=#hodyEndDt# , A.HODY_NOTE_CTNT=#hodyNoteCtnt# , A.HODY_FIX_YN=#hodyFixYn# , A.HODY_FIX_DT = #hodyFixDt# , A.LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_YN=#lvsgCoptnCstApptnYn# , A.LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_DT=#lvsgCoptnCstApptnDt# , A.ISMT=#ismt# , A.REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , A.REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , A.SPCL_HODY_USE_DYS=#spclHodyUseDys# WHERE A.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND A.SYSTEMKEY=B.SYSTEMKEY AND B.RESN_REGN_NUM = #resnRegnNum# AND A.HODY_APPTN_YR=#hodyApptnYr#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HODY_APPTN_YR , HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC , HODY_APPTN_NUM_DYS , HODY_USE_NUM_DYS , HODY_RST_NUM_DYS , HODY_BGNN_DT , HODY_END_DT , HODY_NOTE_CTNT , HODY_FIX_YN , LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_YN , LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , SPCL_HODY_USE_DYS FROM PSNL0126 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND HODY_APPTN_YR=#hodyApptnYr#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT A.DPOB_CD , A.SYSTEMKEY , A.HODY_APPTN_YR , A.HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC , A.HODY_APPTN_NUM_DYS , A.HODY_USE_NUM_DYS , A.HODY_RST_NUM_DYS , A.HODY_BGNN_DT , A.HODY_END_DT , A.HODY_NOTE_CTNT , A.HODY_FIX_YN , A.HODY_FIX_DT , A.LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_YN , A.LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_DT , A.SPCL_HODY_NUM_DYS , A.SPCL_HODY_USE_DYS , A.KYBDR , A.INPT_DT , A.INPT_ADDR , A.ISMT , A.REVN_DT , A.REVN_ADDR , B.HAN_NM , B.ENG_NM , B.CHIN_CHAR_NM , B.RESN_REGN_NUM , B.SX_DIV_CD , B.YOOBH_MNTH_DAY , B.SCLC_DIV_CD , B.NATN_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.NATN_CD) AS NATN_NM , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.NATN_CD, '12') AS NATN_ITEM , B.DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM , B.BUSIN_CD , NVL2(B.BUSIN_CD, '(' || (SELECT E.BUSIN_APPTN_YR FROM BASS0500 E WHERE B.DPOB_CD = E.DPOB_CD AND B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD = E.DEPT_CD AND B.BUSIN_CD = E.BUSIN_CD AND SUBSTR (B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4) = E.BUSIN_APPTN_YR) || ')' || (SELECT E.BUSIN_NM FROM BASS0500 E WHERE B.DPOB_CD = E.DPOB_CD AND B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD = E.DEPT_CD AND B.BUSIN_CD = E.BUSIN_CD AND SUBSTR (B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4) = E.BUSIN_APPTN_YR), '')AS BUSIN_NM , B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS CURR_AFFN_DEPT_NM , B.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD , B.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , B.ODTY_CD , B.FRST_EMYMT_DT , B.EMYMT_DIV_CD , B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT , B.EMYMT_END_DT , B.PYSP_CD , B.HDOFC_CODTN_CD , B.RETRY_DT , B.RETRY_REAS_CTNT , B.FRGNR_DIV_CD , B.PSPT_NUM , B.STY_BGNN_DT , B.STY_END_DT , B.END_SCHL , B.END_DEGR_DIV_CD , B.PMTN_SCDU_DT , B.PYSP_PRMTN_SCDU_DT , B.REYMN_SCDU_DT , B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1') AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_NM , B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD, '1') AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_NM , B.CURR_PYSP_APPMT_DT , B.CURR_DEPT_APPMT_DT , B.PERN_NOTE_CTNT , NVL(B.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000') AS PYSP_GRDE_CD , B.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.TYP_OCCU_CD, B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1') AS DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_NM , D.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD FROM PSNL0126 A, PSNL0100 B, PAYR0500 D WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND A.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY AND A.SYSTEMKEY = D.SYSTEMKEY
A.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
B.HDOFC_CODTN_CD
#hdofcCodtnCdArr[]#
B.DEPT_CD = #mangeDeptCd#
B.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD=#repbtyBusinDivCd#
B.HDOFC_CODTN_CD NOT IN ('A0030020')
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' ))) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(B.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD IN ( SELECT BA0400.DEPT_CD FROM BASS0400 BA0400 WHERE BA0400.DEPT_USE_YN = 'Y' START WITH BA0400.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
CONNECT BY PRIOR BA0400.DEPT_CD = BA0400.HHRK_DEPT_CD )
)
B.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
D.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
B.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
A.HODY_APPTN_YR = #hodyApptnYr#
B.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
A.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
B.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
AND A.HODY_FIX_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY A.DPOB_CD DESC , A.SYSTEMKEY DESC , A.HODY_APPTN_YR DESC
) T WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#
) T )

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT A.DPOB_CD , A.SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0126 A, PSNL0100 B, PAYR0500 D WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND A.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY AND A.SYSTEMKEY = D.SYSTEMKEY
A.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
B.HDOFC_CODTN_CD
#hdofcCodtnCdArr[]#
B.HDOFC_CODTN_CD NOT IN ('A0030020')
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' ))) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(B.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD IN ( SELECT BA0400.DEPT_CD FROM BASS0400 BA0400 WHERE BA0400.DEPT_USE_YN = 'Y' START WITH BA0400.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
CONNECT BY PRIOR BA0400.DEPT_CD = BA0400.HHRK_DEPT_CD )
)
B.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
D.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
B.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
B.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
B.DEPT_CD = #mangeDeptCd#
B.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD=#repbtyBusinDivCd#
B.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
A.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
B.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
AND A.HODY_FIX_YN = 'N'
)

SELECT A.DPOB_CD , A.SYSTEMKEY , A.HODY_APPTN_YR , A.HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC , A.HODY_APPTN_NUM_DYS , A.HODY_USE_NUM_DYS , A.HODY_RST_NUM_DYS , A.HODY_BGNN_DT , A.HODY_END_DT , A.HODY_NOTE_CTNT , A.HODY_FIX_YN , A.LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_YN , A.LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_DT , A.SPCL_HODY_NUM_DYS , A.SPCL_HODY_USE_DYS , A.KYBDR , A.INPT_DT , A.INPT_ADDR , A.ISMT , A.REVN_DT , A.REVN_ADDR , A.HODY_FIX_DT , B.HAN_NM , B.ENG_NM , B.CHIN_CHAR_NM , SUBSTR(B.RESN_REGN_NUM,1,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(B.RESN_REGN_NUM,-7) AS RESN_REGN_NUM , B.SX_DIV_CD , B.YOOBH_MNTH_DAY , B.SCLC_DIV_CD , B.NATN_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.NATN_CD) AS NATN_NM , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.NATN_CD, '12') AS NATN_ITEM , B.DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM , B.BUSIN_CD , NVL2(B.BUSIN_CD, '(' || (SELECT E.BUSIN_APPTN_YR FROM BASS0500 E WHERE B.DPOB_CD = E.DPOB_CD AND B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD = E.DEPT_CD AND B.BUSIN_CD = E.BUSIN_CD AND SUBSTR (B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4) = E.BUSIN_APPTN_YR) || ')' || (SELECT E.BUSIN_NM FROM BASS0500 E WHERE B.DPOB_CD = E.DPOB_CD AND B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD = E.DEPT_CD AND B.BUSIN_CD = E.BUSIN_CD AND SUBSTR (B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4) = E.BUSIN_APPTN_YR), '')AS BUSIN_NM , B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS CURR_AFFN_DEPT_NM , B.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD , B.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , B.ODTY_CD , B.FRST_EMYMT_DT , B.EMYMT_DIV_CD , B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT , B.EMYMT_END_DT , B.PYSP_CD , B.HDOFC_CODTN_CD , B.RETRY_DT , B.RETRY_REAS_CTNT , B.FRGNR_DIV_CD , B.PSPT_NUM , B.STY_BGNN_DT , B.STY_END_DT , B.END_SCHL , B.END_DEGR_DIV_CD , B.PMTN_SCDU_DT , B.PYSP_PRMTN_SCDU_DT , B.REYMN_SCDU_DT , B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1') AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_NM , B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD, '1') AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_NM , B.CURR_PYSP_APPMT_DT , B.CURR_DEPT_APPMT_DT , B.PERN_NOTE_CTNT , NVL(B.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000') AS PYSP_GRDE_CD , B.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.TYP_OCCU_CD, B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1') AS DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_NM , D.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , NVL((SELECT MIN(F.HODY_NUM_DYS) FROM PSNL2100 F WHERE A.DPOB_CD = F.DPOB_CD(+) AND B.TYP_OCCU_CD = F.TYP_OCCU_CD(+) AND B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = F.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD(+) AND NVL (fcBass0300ITEMNM (B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1'), 0) >= F.HODY_NUM_DYS_OVR(+) AND NVL (fcBass0300ITEMNM (B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1'), 0) < F.HODY_NUM_DYS_UDR(+) AND #hodyBgnnDt# >= F.HODY_NUM_DYS_BGNN_DT(+) AND #hodyEndDt# <= F.HODY_NUM_DYS_END_DT(+) AND F.HODY_NUM_DYS_USE_YN = 'Y' ), '0') AS HODY_NUM_DYS FROM PSNL0126 A, PSNL0100 B, PAYR0500 D WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND A.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY AND A.SYSTEMKEY = D.SYSTEMKEY AND B.HDOFC_CODTN_CD NOT IN ('A0030020')
A.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' ))) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(B.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
B.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
A.HODY_APPTN_YR = #hodyApptnYr#
A.HODY_BGNN_DT >= #hodyBgnnDt#
A.HODY_END_DT <= #hodyEndDt#
D.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
B.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
B.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
A.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
B.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
AND A.HODY_FIX_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY A.DPOB_CD DESC , A.SYSTEMKEY DESC , A.HODY_APPTN_YR DESC

SELECT A.DPOB_CD , A.SYSTEMKEY , A.HODY_APPTN_YR , A.HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC , A.HODY_APPTN_NUM_DYS , A.HODY_USE_NUM_DYS , A.HODY_RST_NUM_DYS , A.HODY_BGNN_DT , A.HODY_END_DT , A.HODY_NOTE_CTNT , A.HODY_FIX_YN , A.HODY_FIX_DT , A.LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_YN , A.LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_DT , A.SPCL_HODY_NUM_DYS , A.KYBDR , A.INPT_DT , A.INPT_ADDR , A.ISMT , A.REVN_DT , A.REVN_ADDR , A.SPCL_HODY_NUM_DYS , A.SPCL_HODY_USE_DYS , B.HAN_NM , B.ENG_NM , B.CHIN_CHAR_NM , B.RESN_REGN_NUM , B.SX_DIV_CD , B.YOOBH_MNTH_DAY , B.SCLC_DIV_CD , B.NATN_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.NATN_CD) AS NATN_NM , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.NATN_CD, '12') AS NATN_ITEM , B.DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM , B.BUSIN_CD , NVL2(B.BUSIN_CD, '(' || (SELECT E.BUSIN_APPTN_YR FROM BASS0500 E WHERE B.DPOB_CD = E.DPOB_CD AND B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD = E.DEPT_CD AND B.BUSIN_CD = E.BUSIN_CD AND SUBSTR (B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4) = E.BUSIN_APPTN_YR) || ')' || (SELECT E.BUSIN_NM FROM BASS0500 E WHERE B.DPOB_CD = E.DPOB_CD AND B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD = E.DEPT_CD AND B.BUSIN_CD = E.BUSIN_CD AND SUBSTR (B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4) = E.BUSIN_APPTN_YR), '')AS BUSIN_NM , B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS CURR_AFFN_DEPT_NM , B.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD , B.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , B.ODTY_CD , B.FRST_EMYMT_DT , B.EMYMT_DIV_CD , B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT , B.EMYMT_END_DT , B.PYSP_CD , B.HDOFC_CODTN_CD , B.RETRY_DT , B.RETRY_REAS_CTNT , B.FRGNR_DIV_CD , B.PSPT_NUM , B.STY_BGNN_DT , B.STY_END_DT , B.END_SCHL , B.END_DEGR_DIV_CD , B.PMTN_SCDU_DT , B.PYSP_PRMTN_SCDU_DT , B.REYMN_SCDU_DT , B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1') AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_NM , B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD, '1') AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_NM , B.CURR_PYSP_APPMT_DT , B.CURR_DEPT_APPMT_DT , B.PERN_NOTE_CTNT , NVL(B.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000') AS PYSP_GRDE_CD , B.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.TYP_OCCU_CD, B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1') AS DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_NM , D.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD FROM PSNL0126 A, PSNL0100 B, PAYR0500 D WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND A.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY AND A.SYSTEMKEY = D.SYSTEMKEY
A.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
B.HDOFC_CODTN_CD
#hdofcCodtnCdArr[]#
B.HDOFC_CODTN_CD NOT IN ('A0030020')
B.DEPT_CD = #mangeDeptCd#
B.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD=#repbtyBusinDivCd#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' )) ) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(B.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD IN ( SELECT BA0400.DEPT_CD FROM BASS0400 BA0400 WHERE BA0400.DEPT_USE_YN = 'Y' START WITH BA0400.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
CONNECT BY PRIOR BA0400.DEPT_CD = BA0400.HHRK_DEPT_CD )
)
B.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
D.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
B.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
A.HODY_APPTN_YR = #hodyApptnYr#
B.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
A.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
B.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
AND A.HODY_FIX_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY A.DPOB_CD DESC , A.HODY_APPTN_YR DESC ,(SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 DD WHERE DD.DEPT_CD = B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND DD.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD) ASC

SELECT A.DPOB_CD , A.SYSTEMKEY , A.HODY_APPTN_YR , A.HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC , A.HODY_APPTN_NUM_DYS , A.HODY_USE_NUM_DYS , A.HODY_RST_NUM_DYS , A.HODY_BGNN_DT , A.HODY_END_DT , A.HODY_NOTE_CTNT , A.HODY_FIX_YN , A.LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_YN , A.LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_DT , A.HODY_FIX_DT , A.SPCL_HODY_NUM_DYS , A.SPCL_HODY_USE_DYS , B.HAN_NM , B.ENG_NM , B.CHIN_CHAR_NM , B.RESN_REGN_NUM , B.SX_DIV_CD , B.YOOBH_MNTH_DAY , B.SCLC_DIV_CD , B.NATN_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.NATN_CD) AS NATN_NM , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.NATN_CD, '12') AS NATN_ITEM , B.DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM , B.BUSIN_CD , NVL2(B.BUSIN_CD, '(' || (SELECT E.BUSIN_APPTN_YR FROM BASS0500 E WHERE B.DPOB_CD = E.DPOB_CD AND B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD = E.DEPT_CD AND B.BUSIN_CD = E.BUSIN_CD AND SUBSTR (B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4) = E.BUSIN_APPTN_YR) || ')' || (SELECT E.BUSIN_NM FROM BASS0500 E WHERE B.DPOB_CD = E.DPOB_CD AND B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD = E.DEPT_CD AND B.BUSIN_CD = E.BUSIN_CD AND SUBSTR (B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4) = E.BUSIN_APPTN_YR), '')AS BUSIN_NM , B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS CURR_AFFN_DEPT_NM , B.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD , B.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , B.ODTY_CD , B.FRST_EMYMT_DT , B.EMYMT_DIV_CD , B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT , B.EMYMT_END_DT , B.PYSP_CD , B.HDOFC_CODTN_CD , B.RETRY_DT , B.RETRY_REAS_CTNT , B.FRGNR_DIV_CD , B.PSPT_NUM , B.STY_BGNN_DT , B.STY_END_DT , B.END_SCHL , B.END_DEGR_DIV_CD , B.PMTN_SCDU_DT , B.PYSP_PRMTN_SCDU_DT , B.REYMN_SCDU_DT , B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1') AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_NM , B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD, '1') AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_NM , B.CURR_PYSP_APPMT_DT , B.CURR_DEPT_APPMT_DT , B.PERN_NOTE_CTNT , NVL(B.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000') AS PYSP_GRDE_CD , B.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.TYP_OCCU_CD, B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1') AS DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_NM , D.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD FROM PSNL0126 A, PSNL0100 B, PAYR0500 D WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY AND A.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY = D.SYSTEMKEY AND A.HODY_APPTN_YR = #hodyApptnYr# AND B.HDOFC_CODTN_CD NOT IN ('A0030020')
B.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' ))) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(B.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD IN ( SELECT BA0400.DEPT_CD FROM BASS0400 BA0400 WHERE BA0400.DEPT_USE_YN = 'Y' START WITH BA0400.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
CONNECT BY PRIOR BA0400.DEPT_CD = BA0400.HHRK_DEPT_CD )
)
B.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
B.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
B.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
B.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
B.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
AND A.HODY_FIX_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY B.DPOB_CD DESC ,( SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 DD WHERE DD.DEPT_CD = B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND DD.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD) ASC

SELECT A.DPOB_CD , A.SYSTEMKEY , A.HODY_APPTN_YR , A.HODY_APPTN_NUM_DYS , A.HODY_USE_NUM_DYS , A.HODY_RST_NUM_DYS , A.HODY_BGNN_DT , A.HODY_END_DT , A.HODY_NOTE_CTNT , A.HODY_FIX_YN , A.LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_YN , A.LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_DT , A.SPCL_HODY_NUM_DYS , A.SPCL_HODY_USE_DYS , A.KYBDR , A.INPT_DT , A.INPT_ADDR , A.ISMT , A.REVN_DT , A.REVN_ADDR , A.HODY_FIX_DT , B.HAN_NM , B.ENG_NM , B.CHIN_CHAR_NM , SUBSTR(B.RESN_REGN_NUM,1,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(B.RESN_REGN_NUM,-7) AS RESN_REGN_NUM , B.SX_DIV_CD , B.YOOBH_MNTH_DAY , B.SCLC_DIV_CD , B.NATN_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.NATN_CD) AS NATN_NM , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.NATN_CD, '12') AS NATN_ITEM , B.DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM , B.BUSIN_CD , NVL2(B.BUSIN_CD, '(' || (SELECT E.BUSIN_APPTN_YR FROM BASS0500 E WHERE B.DPOB_CD = E.DPOB_CD AND B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD = E.DEPT_CD AND B.BUSIN_CD = E.BUSIN_CD AND SUBSTR (B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4) = E.BUSIN_APPTN_YR) || ')' || (SELECT E.BUSIN_NM FROM BASS0500 E WHERE B.DPOB_CD = E.DPOB_CD AND B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD = E.DEPT_CD AND B.BUSIN_CD = E.BUSIN_CD AND SUBSTR (B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 1, 4) = E.BUSIN_APPTN_YR), '')AS BUSIN_NM , B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS CURR_AFFN_DEPT_NM , B.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD , B.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , B.ODTY_CD , B.FRST_EMYMT_DT , B.EMYMT_DIV_CD , B.EMYMT_BGNN_DT , B.EMYMT_END_DT , B.PYSP_CD , B.HDOFC_CODTN_CD , B.RETRY_DT , B.RETRY_REAS_CTNT , B.FRGNR_DIV_CD , B.PSPT_NUM , B.STY_BGNN_DT , B.STY_END_DT , B.END_SCHL , B.END_DEGR_DIV_CD , B.PMTN_SCDU_DT , B.PYSP_PRMTN_SCDU_DT , B.REYMN_SCDU_DT , B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1') AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_NM , B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD, '1') AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_NM , B.CURR_PYSP_APPMT_DT , B.CURR_DEPT_APPMT_DT , B.PERN_NOTE_CTNT , NVL(B.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000') AS PYSP_GRDE_CD , B.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.TYP_OCCU_CD, B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1') AS DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_NM , D.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , NVL((SELECT MIN(F.HODY_NUM_DYS) FROM PSNL2100 F WHERE A.DPOB_CD = F.DPOB_CD(+) AND B.TYP_OCCU_CD = F.TYP_OCCU_CD(+) AND B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = F.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD(+) AND NVL (fcBass0300ITEMNM (B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1'), 0) >= F.HODY_NUM_DYS_OVR(+) AND NVL (fcBass0300ITEMNM (B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1'), 0) < F.HODY_NUM_DYS_UDR(+) AND #hodyBgnnDt# >= F.HODY_NUM_DYS_BGNN_DT(+) AND #hodyEndDt# <= F.HODY_NUM_DYS_END_DT(+) AND F.HODY_NUM_DYS_USE_YN = 'Y' ), '0') AS HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC , NVL((SELECT MIN(F.HODY_NUM_DYS) FROM PSNL2100 F WHERE A.DPOB_CD = F.DPOB_CD(+) AND B.TYP_OCCU_CD = F.TYP_OCCU_CD(+) AND B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = F.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD(+) AND NVL (fcBass0300ITEMNM (B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1'), 0) >= F.HODY_NUM_DYS_OVR(+) AND NVL (fcBass0300ITEMNM (B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1'), 0) < F.HODY_NUM_DYS_UDR(+) AND #hodyBgnnDt# >= F.HODY_NUM_DYS_BGNN_DT(+) AND #hodyEndDt# <= F.HODY_NUM_DYS_END_DT(+) AND F.HODY_NUM_DYS_USE_YN = 'Y' ), '0') AS CHN_NUM_DYS FROM PSNL0126 A, PSNL0100 B, PAYR0500 D WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND A.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY AND A.SYSTEMKEY = D.SYSTEMKEY AND B.HDOFC_CODTN_CD NOT IN ('A0030020')
A.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' )) ) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = B.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(B.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
B.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
A.HODY_APPTN_YR = #hodyApptnYr#
A.HODY_BGNN_DT >= #hodyBgnnDt#
A.HODY_END_DT <= #hodyEndDt#
D.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
B.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
B.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
A.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
B.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
AND A.HODY_FIX_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY A.DPOB_CD DESC , A.SYSTEMKEY DESC , A.HODY_APPTN_YR DESC
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE PSNL0126 SET
HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC=#hodyNumDysSysCalc# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND HODY_APPTN_YR=#hodyApptnYr#

B.STY_END_DT , B.END_SCHL , B.END_DEGR_DIV_CD , B.PMTN_SCDU_DT , B.PYSP_PRMTN_SCDU_DT , B.REYMN_SCDU_DT , B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1') AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_NM , B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD , fcBass0300ITEMNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD, '1') AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM , fcBass0300CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_NM , B.CURR_PYSP_APPMT_DT , B.CURR_DEPT_APPMT_DT , B.PERN_NOTE_CTNT , NVL(B.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000') AS PYSP_GRDE_CD , B.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(B.DPOB_CD, B.TYP_OCCU_CD, B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1') AS DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_NM , D.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , NVL((SELECT MIN(F.HODY_NUM_DYS) FROM PSNL2100 F WHERE A.DPOB_CD = F.DPOB_CD(+) AND B.TYP_OCCU_CD = F.TYP_OCCU_CD(+) AND B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = F.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD(+) AND NVL (fcBass0300ITEMNM (B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1'), 0) >= F.HODY_NUM_DYS_OVR(+) AND NVL (fcBass0300ITEMNM (B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1'), 0) < F.HODY_NUM_DYS_UDR(+) AND #hodyBgnnDt# >= F.HODY_NUM_DYS_BGNN_DT(+) AND #hodyEndDt# <= F.HODY_NUM_DYS_END_DT(+) AND F.HODY_NUM_DYS_USE_YN = 'Y' ), '0') AS HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC , NVL((SELECT MIN(F.HODY_NUM_DYS) FROM PSNL2100 F WHERE A.DPOB_CD = F.DPOB_CD(+) AND B.TYP_OCCU_CD = F.TYP_OCCU_CD(+) AND B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = F.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD(+) AND NVL (fcBass0300ITEMNM (B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1'), 0) >= F.HODY_NUM_DYS_OVR(+) AND NVL (fcBass0300ITEMNM (B.DPOB_CD, B.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, '1'), 0) < F.HODY_NUM_DYS_UDR(+) AND #hodyBgnnDt# >= F.HODY_NUM_DYS_BGNN_DT(+) AND #hodyEndDt# <= F.HODY_NUM_DYS_END_DT(+) AND F.HODY_NUM_DYS_USE_YN = 'Y' ), '0') AS CHN_NUM_DYS FROM PSNL0126 A, PSNL0100 B, PAYR0500 D WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND A.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY AND A.SYSTEMKEY = D.SYSTEMKEY AND B.HDOFC_CODTN_CD NOT IN ('A0030020')
A.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
B.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
A.HODY_APPTN_YR = #hodyApptnYr#
D.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
B.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
B.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
B.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
A.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
B.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
AND A.HODY_FIX_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.DPOB_CD DESC , A.SYSTEMKEY DESC , A.HODY_APPTN_YR DESC

SELECT #hodyApptnYr# AS HODY_APPTN_YR , #hanNm# AS HAN_NM , (CASE WHEN LENGTH(#resnRegnNum#) = 13 THEN '19'||SUBSTR(#resnRegnNum#,1,6) WHEN LENGTH(#resnRegnNum#) = 6 THEN '19'||#resnRegnNum# WHEN LENGTH(#resnRegnNum#) = 8 THEN #resnRegnNum# END) AS YOOBH_MNTH_DAY , #resnRegnNum# AS RESN_REGN_NUM , (CASE WHEN #resnRegnGbn# = NULL THEN '' WHEN #resnRegnGbn# = 'Y' THEN (SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE RESN_REGN_NUM = REPLACE(#resnRegnNum#, '-', '')) WHEN #resnRegnGbn# = 'N' THEN (SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE HAN_NM = #hanNm# AND YOOBH_MNTH_DAY = CASE WHEN LENGTH(#resnRegnNum#) = 6 THEN '19'||#resnRegnNum# WHEN LENGTH(#resnRegnNum#) = 8 THEN #resnRegnNum# END ) END)AS SYSTEMKEY , NVL ( (SELECT 'Y' FROM PSNL0126 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = (CASE WHEN #resnRegnGbn# = NULL THEN '' WHEN #resnRegnGbn# = 'Y' THEN (SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE RESN_REGN_NUM = REPLACE(#resnRegnNum#, '-', '')) WHEN #resnRegnGbn# = 'N' THEN (SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE HAN_NM = #hanNm# AND YOOBH_MNTH_DAY = CASE WHEN LENGTH(#resnRegnNum#) = 6 THEN '19'||#resnRegnNum# WHEN LENGTH(#resnRegnNum#) = 8 THEN #resnRegnNum# END ) END) AND ROWNUM = 1),'N') AS HODY_NUM_DYS_USE_YN FROM DUAL
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PSNL0126 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY= #systemkey# AND HODY_APPTN_YR=#hodyApptnYr#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PSNL0126 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HODY_APPTN_YR , HODY_NUM_DYS_SYS_CALC , HODY_APPTN_NUM_DYS , HODY_USE_NUM_DYS , HODY_RST_NUM_DYS , HODY_BGNN_DT , HODY_END_DT , HODY_NOTE_CTNT , HODY_FIX_YN , LVSG_COPTN_CST_APPTN_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , SPCL_HODY_NUM_DYS , SPCL_HODY_USE_DYS ) VALUES (#dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #hodyApptnYr# , #hodyNumDysSysCalc# , #hodyApptnNumDys# , #hodyUseNumDys# , #hodyRstNumDys# , #hodyBgnnDt# , #hodyEndDt# , #hodyNoteCtnt# , #hodyFixYn# , NVL(#lvsgCoptnCstApptnYn#,'N') , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# , #spclHodyNumDys# , #spclHodyUseDys#)
